name: Rude Bear Restart
description:
This is the 26th Ludum Dare extended universe Rude Bear game. It was made for the theme.. “Delay the inevitable”

Four crystal hourglasses. Each one stalls the flow of time. Try and collect each one, and if you find yourself stuck, try another direction. Take the crystals back to the clock to rewind time further.

The button next to the clock will rewind time instantly. If you run out of time, the end times will come. But your crystals will remain.

When you are done, press Alt+F4 to quit.


 A jam game by Alex Rose, João Dias and John Pennington.         
   Rude Bear was created by Alex Rose and Antony Dewar.
